title: WURF MODE (Reposted, because wrong board)
body:
So, I've been thinking.
I've been contemplating the game modes that have been popular among Summoners all over the world, and the one that surely stands out the most is the legendary URF mode. Along with this is the amusing NURF mode (did this mode really happen?).
So, I thought of a new idea. What if there was a new game mode- one which would completely change the way the game is played?
In this game mode, WURF, players would take crazy risks to reap large rewards. The main example of this I have thought of is the idea that players would get really good incentives for tower-diving people- like getting double gold for killing someone under their tower, or even more if they die in the process. If the enemy is on a killstreak, shutting them down (and dying in the process) could net similar results.
I'm imagining people jumping into turrets all over the Rift.
Wurf.

replies.body: Sounds more like GO HAM MODE xD.

That sounds alike an epic chance for total madness... maybe make it 10v10 as well? WURF a shot ;P
